contentList.content: Every duel is a symphony. You've honed your magic into breathtaking dueling.
Consume a use of Bardic Inspiration to add [1] to the damage of your next cantrip. The inspiration will be consumed whether the attack lands or not.
In searching to make your dueling become instinctive, You've studied those who have magic innately. (You learn a cantrip from the Sorcerer Spell list)
You're always ready for a duel, and are seldom late to act. Gain +3 Initiative on the first round of combat.
You're not just a solo act. Use a bonus action after landing a cantrip to provide covering fire for an ally.
You're harder to hit after the covering fire laid down.
Provide cover fire, Granting an ally +2 to AC and saving throws for a short time.
On the first round of combat, your cantrips gain an additional target.
And when cover fire isn't needed, you can make another attack as a bonus action.
